tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  patient_ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_type VARCHAR(50),
  appointment_status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthcareProviders (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(50),
  provider_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthcareDisparities (
  disparity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disparity_type VARCHAR(50),
  affected_population VARCHAR(50),
  date_reported DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  race VARCHAR(50),
  address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE provider_data (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE appointment_data (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE population_data (
  population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  population_name VARCHAR(50),
  demographic_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE patient (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    race VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE appointment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    hospital_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
